title: Property of the State: Gay Men in the Apartheid Military

sources.title: Military State | Full Action Sci-Fi Movie
sources.description:

Military State (RZ-9) - A computer scientist and drone pilot is put on a hit list due to his religious beliefs. He and his sister are pursued by super soldiers, called Erasers, to capture them dead or alive.

2015
Stars: Ethan McDowell, Morgan Obenreder, Josh Marble

metadata.Plot: Gays in the military in aparteid era South Africa. The situation made more difficult by conscription.
